RHighlight.p: It’s a joy to stay at such a charmingly authentic Balinese villa in such a great location in Canggu. Enjoy the tranquillity whilst spending days around the pool in the lush garden setting and the romantic ambience looking out from the open living areas at night.

RSurroundArea.p: You would be missing out if you didn’t visit Hotel Tugu, next door to Kakatua, during your holiday. Touted as ‘a resort that celebrates Indonesian history’ this gorgeous boutique hotel and is stacked with fascinating antiques. The hotel is also an ideal choice for an extravagant but exquisite dinner. The popular Echo Beach, just a two-minute stroll from Kakatua, is a great spot for surfing, sunset drinks or dinner at one of the many restaurants overlooking the beach. Sunday barbecues at Skallywag’s (with live music) are incredibly popular with expatriates and tourists alike: people drive from far and wide to jostle for tables and enjoy slow service, so be sure to book a table as come 6pm they are the most prized real estate on the west coast! Guests at Kakatua have complimentary membership of the Canggu Club (2km from the villa) where, amongst many sports and leisure facilities, there’s an Olympic sized public swimming pool with a kid’s pool and slide, tennis courts and a well equipped gym.

ROverallComments.p: Villa Kakatua is a little Balinese gem, a classic Bali residence in an area where contemporary villas are popping up quicker than we can visit them. Without being absolute beachfront, Kakatua’s location is as good as it gets in Canggu (due to inflated land prices there are very few beachfront villas in this area). The well-landscaped garden is an oasis in which you can spend your days basking on the sun loungers or lying in the shade of the poolside balé, and your nights under the floodlit palm and frangipani trees. This, coupled with the candles around the garden lit by the staff each evening, makes for a very romantic backdrop to the dining balé.

Kakatua is more spacious than Villa Kedidi, it’s 3-bedroomed sister next door, but hiring both villas (they share staff and a management office) would give you enough room to comfortably sleep 14 people (probably a few more if you are holidaying with young children – after all, you can fit half a dozen small ones into the one bed at Kakatua!). We found the staff very attentive and professional.

We love staying in Canggu. It’s rapidly becoming one of the most popular areas in Bali, yet it retains a rural charm and there are still fields and rice paddies between the villas. That’s not to say it will be to everyone’s taste, as there is no shopping or nightlife here (nor any air conditioning in the open-air living areas) – you must travel into Seminyak for this. However Canggu does offer some quaint and varied dining spots along with a rugged surf beach.

RUnpleasantSurprise.p: Although my wife slept like a log, I found the bed a little hard for my taste. This wasn’t all bad news though as it made it easy to get up for the football at 3am! Whilst you can enjoy sports and other satellite channels on the TV in the living room, the TV’s in the bedroom are set up for watching DVD’s only and they are a little on the small side. Call us fussy but we just adore a big telly.

REVIEW.Name: Bali Exclusive Wedding Bali Exclusive Wedding
REVIEW.ROverallComments:
Over the last 3 weeks we stayed in 3 villas. Villa Katatua was our favorite, with top notch staff, excellent car and driver and beautiful gardens. The villa has a very warm feeling like a home away from home. Value for money Kakatua is one of the best villas in Bali to stay in along with its location. we highly recommend this villa only steps from the beach.
Stacey Hannah

REVIEW.Name: Trish Batchelor
REVIEW.ROverallComments: A really lovely villa walking distance to Canggu beach and next to Hotel Tugu. Very quiet, beautifully maintained, lovely staff. Highly recommended.

REVIEW.Name: Elke Burridge Sandrock
REVIEW.ROverallComments: The villa was perfect for families with small children. With the pool fence up, we could relax with the children running around the lovely grounds. The staff were outstanding, the food was so good we rarely ate out. The bedrooms and bathrooms were all very comfortable and spacious and worked well for 5 adults and 4 children. The membership for the Canggu Club was an extra bonus - very close, and again child friendly.

REVIEW.Name: Marrtje Hendriks
REVIEW.ROverallComments: We thoroughly enjoyed our stay at Villa Kakatua. The staff was super friendly, the house was lovely and yet well suited for children. They had a wonderful time too! We loved the fact that we could have a massage in the comfort of our own villa, which otherwise would have been difficult to organise with three small children in tow. The food at the villa was good too; fresh and with plenty of options to choose from. Also, we want to extend a special thank you to the villa manager who made sure that we could stay in Villa Kedidi after checking out, while waiting for our (late) flight out.

REVIEW.Name: Anthony Schinck
REVIEW.ROverallComments:
To all of the team, thank you for a wonderful and relaxing stay at Villa Kakatua, Bali. It was amazing. We all enjoyed it very much. The beautiful Villa, the surrounds, the staff were all terrific. We would most definitely stay again. Could you please pass on our thanks to all of the staff who made our stay so effortless and enjoyable. Everyone was great, from the food, from the attentive and personable service and the wonderful way that they looked after our little 2 year old boy (who had such a good time).
Thank you! We look forward to our next stay with you.

REVIEW.Name: Mark Busine
REVIEW.ROverallComments: This is our second visit which in itself is a strong recommendation. The area around Canggu is developing quickly, oferring many more options in terms of restaurants etc. Having said that you could easily wrap yourself up in the cocoon of the Villa and still have a wonderful stay.

REVIEW.Name: Alison Yesilcimen
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Villa Kakatua is a magical place that everyone should experience! Our family of 7 had an amazing week here. The staff are unbelievably friendly and and the food they cooked was incredible. I would highly recommend this villa to anyone looking for a relaxing and luxurious place to stay in Bali.

REVIEW.Name: Prudence Roborgh
REVIEW.ROverallComments:
As a family group of 15 meeting in Bali for my 60 th birthday celebration including 3 babies of 14 - 18 th months , Villa Kakatua & Kedidii , were the perfect choice for the 6 days.
The beautifulf furnishings , the well planned outdoor areas , the sumptuous outdoor bathrooms , coupled with the gracious , friendly, caring Balinese staff who attended to all our needs and more by surprising us.with a basket of Easter eggs lovingly decorated with crepe paper wrappers , plus a 60 th birthday tart......So if you are looking for charm , warmth , ambience and style..within walking distance to Echo Beach & Betelnut cafe ,, driving to Seminyak ,Canggu delicatessen .Tanah Lot sunsets or just to relax.and be looked after with your choice of meals cooked by the resident Villa chefs,,,,,.these are the villas to choose. We had a wonderful time in peaceful Canggu.....A perfect holiday venue......a wonderful birthday celebration .

REVIEW.Name: James Ankers
REVIEW.ROverallComments: A charming Balinese villa which we would thoroughly recommend. A lovely place for the family, with wonderful staff who really made our stay memorable.

REVIEW.Name: Ivor Condric
REVIEW.ROverallComments: The staff are very friendly and cannot do enough for you. Fantastic villa, very clean with all the creature comforts. The food cooked by the chefs was excellent. Would recommend a stay here and would even go back again.

REVIEW.Name: Che Liu
REVIEW.ROverallComments: From arrival to departure the Villa Kakatua experience was truly amazing. Returning back to reality was going to be very very hard! A group of friends all needing a much much needed recharge from our daily working lives Villa Kakatua was just that solution. Such gorgeous tropical surroundings with the whole experience made perfect with the friendliness, unintrusive, diligent staff.

REVIEW.Name: Olivia Walker
REVIEW.ROverallComments: I had the best experience at Villa Kakatua! The staff was warm and welcoming. The Villa is beautiful, clean, and perfectly located. I would recommend this Villa to anyone!

REVIEW.Name: Beatrice BARRAL
REVIEW.ROverallComments: We spent 2 weeks in villa KAKATUA. We had real holidays there. All the staff is really kind and the villa very very confortable. Our kids enjoyed the location because it took them just few minutes to go to the beach for surfing. REALLY GREAT HOLIDAYS

REVIEW.Name: Nick Leake
REVIEW.ROverallComments: We had a lovely time and the onsite staff were excellent especially the cooking. Big positive was nightly mossie replent which waylaid our fears of bites. Everything was clean, neat and tidy. Most furniture seemed dated so probaly time to be refurbished. Pool fantastic and outdoor areas excellent.

REVIEW.Name: Barbara Hocking
REVIEW.ROverallComments: A terrific place for a family holiday! Facilities were adapted to be child-friendly and the staff are wonderful -welcoming, gentle and very flexible in tolerating some chaos as well as meeting the between meal hunger pangs of toddlers (and adults!). And all the while remaining appropriately efficient. Air-conditioned bedrooms, lovely grounds, great food and a good-sized pool kept everyone very happy, even on the hot and humid days. Warmly recommended.

REVIEW.Name: Peter Holzberger
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Great place to stay with kids, staff are wonderful, meals were fantastic. After the first day we asked the staff to surprise us with dinner by preparing Balinese dishes (buffet stye). Drivers are knowledgeable on best route of travel. If you wish to have a day out, best to use the Villa Drivers a great bunch to spend the day with. All up we can't say 11 out of 10 but we are close cheers Peter

REVIEW.Name: Jonathan Kaye
REVIEW.ROverallComments: What an amazing spot !! Great Location, Great Food, Great Staff. We stayed for 2 weeks with 4 Adults and 3 Children. Villa was perfect, love the open living and dining rooms. We want to come back.

REVIEW.Name: Hugh Marks
REVIEW.ROverallComments: We had an amazing experience with our family friends at Villa Kakatua and Villa Kedidi. 6 adults and 10 children. So relaxing and such a great family time.

REVIEW.Name: Justine Decandia
REVIEW.ROverallComments: This was our second stay at Elite Havens in Canggu and we have not been disappointed. The staff and services at Kakatua Villa was faultless. Every meal was fantastic, some of the best we have had in Bali. Love the proximity to the beach and we have made the most of happy hour at Old Mans.Thank you so much for a wonderful stay.

REVIEW.Name: Bridget Chung
REVIEW.ROverallComments: We had 6 Adults and 6 Young Childrens staying for 3 nights. Staff are exceptionally friendly and helpful, and special mentioned to the Chefs, who whipped up the fantastic meals. BBQ Snapper and prawns are totally to die for!! We will definitely return.

REVIEW.Name: Christopher Ellis
REVIEW.ROverallComments: We stayed at Villa Kakatua for 4 nights with 4 Adults and 2 Infants, we choose to stay here because of the family friendly facilities. A much needed pool fences provided peace of mind and little extras like high chairs, toys were great. The staffs is wonderful, we ate every meals at the villa and found the meals wonderful. Close proximate to the beach and beautiful grounds all add up to a perfect vacation.

REVIEW.Name: Shinta Holdsworth
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Thanks for an amazing stay had by 2 families. 5 Adults and 3 young Children. Every need was catered for, fantastic dinner provided on arrival. Every meal was of the highest quality and i would recommend you eat at the villa rather than outside. You can order anything but we loved chicken satay. We all ate way too much and some of us can no longer fit into our clothes. Staff are all friendly and children are well caterer for. Thank you for a fantastic stay!

REVIEW.Name: Edwin Lee
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Very nice place with high quality facilities and services. Staff are also very friendly and professional. Rooms and living area are very comfortable. Would definitely recommend to others and come back again.

REVIEW.Name: Bali Family Villas
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Thanks to everyone at Villa Kakatua for making our holiday so enjoyable. The Villa was perfect for our two families and it was a lot of fun exploring Canggu and the beach, then returning to the villa pool for more relaxing. Thanks to the cooks for some fantastic meals, the beef rendang was my favorite, and a big thank you to Benny Driver who expertly navigated us around Bali and put up with some noisy boys in the back seat with no fuss!! Thank you again.

REVIEW.Name: Jenny Longmuir
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Thank you to all the wonderful staff for a great vacation and their friendly hospitality. A relaxing week of swimming, sunshine, surfing, shopping and relaxing (not to mentioned the fabulous food). We look forward to staying again.

REVIEW.Name: Steve Tickell
REVIEW.ROverallComments: It was a perfect venue, the perfect location and the perfect setting for a fantastic week of fun and relaxation. The staff in the villas led by Putu the Manager, Gusti, Widia, Benny, Novi and Yuni as well as Gede Alit and Dewa made our stay even more perfect. Thank you for your patience, help and friendliness.

REVIEW.Name: Bali Villas Cantik
REVIEW.ROverallComments: We traveled to Bali as a Family Group to celebrate my niece 30th Birthday. The Villa was perfect for the birthday celebration and thank you to the wonderful staff, we love and truly enjoyed our stay. The staff are extremely helpful and professional in all aspect of their work, the kitchen is run smoothly and with extra cleanliness, proudly delicious meals. Novi is an exceptional person and a great asset and should be recommended for her great work. Thank you for wonderful stay.

REVIEW.Name: Natalie Ashley
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Thank you for a great holiday, we had so much fun and we have had an awesome time. The food was brilliant and we wish we could stay here for longer. Can't wait to come back here next year.

REVIEW.Name: Anna Trefely
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Beautiful surroundings, staff are extremely professional. Meals are fantastic. We had a lovely family time together.

REVIEW.Name: Doulene Walker
REVIEW.ROverallComments: My husband and l came to Bali many times a year and we are currently arranging our residency. We have stayed in many hotels and villas. Villa Kakatua has been exceptional, the best yet. The main reason is due to the fantastic and extremely professional staff; Putu the Manager, Gusti, Yuni and Nengah. This trip we brought our parents from UK, we had such an enjoyable trip. Yuni and Nengah prepared amazing food for us and took care of us with many fruit platters and pots of tea. We thoroughly enjoyed our rooms and the swimming pool, our rooms were constantly tidied and cleaned. Honestly one of our best stays in Bali.

REVIEW.Name: Ajay Srikrishna
REVIEW.ROverallComments: We had a wonderful one week stay at the villa. When l sent pictures of the lawn from the seat outside my room, all my friends were so envious of the beautiful surroundings, looking like a resort. The staff were so helpful and they thought about the little things. We were so used to the ready service that started expecting this from other restaurants we visited. Bali is a beautiful country with well mannered people that we love visit again and again as well as tell our friends about Happy New Year.

REVIEW.Name: Graeme Pitches
REVIEW.ROverallComments: We are very sad to leave !! We loved our time at Villa Kakatua, The Villa and grounds are beautiful, the staff are incredible. They looked after us so well, beautiful breakfasts every morning and the ability to cater to all our needs. They even found a baby bath for us. The Villa was great for our 3 months old baby, he loved it here too!! Thank you to all the staff for such an enjoyable holiday. We plan to be back and can't wait!!

REVIEW.Name: Leah Dabron
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Thank you so much for a wonderful stay at Villa Kakatua. We have had such a lovely time here, it will be hard to leave. The staff have been amazing, the meals were delicious and beautifully prepared and the villas and gardens kept perfectly. A special thank you to Putu, Yuni, Novi, Nengah and Widia for taking such a good care of us and also to the ground staff for keeping everything so beautifully during our stay.

REVIEW.Name: William Matthews
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Wonderful .. Wonderful .. Wonderful. Thank you all for such an amazing family holiday. Taking care of 5 young children and of course the big kids also. Absolutely will be back in the not too distance future. Much appreciated.

REVIEW.Name: David Dougherty
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Lovely and relaxing, the villa is simply beautiful and the staff are wonderful. Nothing is too much trouble for the staff and the food is brilliant. We especially loved the grounds and outdoor shower room.

REVIEW.Name: Kelly Higginbotham
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Big thank you to Putu and his wonderful staff for our stay. All of our needs have been catered too at the highest standard and always with a smile. Such a fabulous villa, location and staff. We look forward to coming back one day.

REVIEW.Name: Natalie Ashley
REVIEW.ROverallComments: We had a great time staying at Kakatua Villa, even better than our first round here. The food was amazing and we felt in love with all the delicious dishes that were served. Thank you for all the care and attention, we will miss you all. Can’t wait for another visit!!!

REVIEW.Name: Susan Foley
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Our time at Villa Kakatua has been perfect. It’s such a beautiful setting and spacious enough, that we could spend days on end here without feeling the need to leave. The staffs have been so wonderful and helpful and the food was delicious. Our time here has made this our most enjoyable Bali Holiday ever.

REVIEW.Name: Bali Family Villas
REVIEW.ROverallComments: We would like to thank you the staff who have made the stay what it was. They have assisted with everything and nothing was too small or too large. The kids have had a great time exploring and swimming and have eaten all the great meals served. We celebrated a 7 year's old birthday, whilst here and they decorated the villa and made the day special. The best serviced villa that we have experienced in all our Bali Trip. Great for the family and all the kids.

REVIEW.Name: Anish Patel
REVIEW.ROverallComments: What a wonderful place – Complete Heaven! Widia, Novi and Putu as well as all the team have looked after us unbelievable well. The rooms are beautiful, the food delicious (Banana pancakes particularly recommended) and location superb. Thank you from all of us.

REVIEW.Name: Sarah Chivers
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Once again the whole team at Villa Kedidi and Villa Kakatua was brilliant! Our stay has been made even more enjoyable with the attentiveness and dedication of everyone. The meals have been yummy, the rooms beautifully presented and the gardens spectacular. We have had an amazing, relaxing time here in Bali.

REVIEW.Name: Karen Arul
REVIEW.ROverallComments: We all had a great time here in Villa Kakatua, the food was fantastic, the staff were very friendly toward us, also very kind. Widia was the most helpful, kind and accommodating toward us. He especially drove us around to where we needed to go (and waited for us). We would like to thank all the Chef, Security guard and practically everyone for being so kind, helpful, patient, and accommodating toward us, the fact it was not our first time here in Villa Kakatua. When we got here, it was really heart warming, how everyone remembered our names. Once again thank you very much.

REVIEW.Name: Bali Villas Cantik
REVIEW.ROverallComments: We have had lovely relaxing time at Villa Kakatua - so much, so none of us want to leave! The gardens were beautifully maintained, the rooms very well presented - but most importantly the staff were all exceptional! A big thank you to you all for making our first family trip to Bali so special. We will take home lots of happy memories from this place. A special thank you to Widia for going above and beyond for us and to all the staff who prepared our delicious meals. The food was fantastic. Hopefully we will get a chance to come back some day.

REVIEW.Name: Vivian Bogoevski
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Our time at the villa has been very relaxing and enjoyable. A special thank you to all staff for being very friendly and always ready to help us. The smiling faces and kindness from all staff has made this experience even better.

REVIEW.Name: Megan Shannon
REVIEW.ROverallComments: This is our third time here and we love this villa so much. The staffs here are so accommodating and so amazing. Thank you for looking after us and we certainly hope to see you again really soon. We will miss you all till then. Thank you.

REVIEW.Name: Alexander Ryser
REVIEW.ROverallComments: This was already the second time when we stayed in the Villa Kakatua. it was another time a great, wonderful and lovely staff. The staff give this villa the wonderful character of love, also the food was again very delicious and we loved all the dishes which the kitchen staff prepared. Thank you for everything and see you soon.

REVIEW.Name: Alex Bij De Vaate
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Best time ever!!! The villa is wonderful but what has made it truly great was Pak Putu's team. All of them made a great effort to make our family holiday an experience to never forget! Nothing was ever too much from arranging day trips for grandparents, to getting Nasi Wardani all the way from Denpasar as well as arranging seafood BBQ. You made our holiday a truly relaxing experience and special note to the Chef - the food was delicious. Terima kasih for everything.

REVIEW.Name: Jesse Timm
REVIEW.ROverallComments: This was our 1st time in Bali and we had un forgettable experience. Our family flew in from LA, Boston, Colorado and Singapore for one week and it was well worth the trip. The customer service was wonderful; everyone called us by name and helped us with all of our needs. We had 4 dinners/ meals at the villa, prepared by the staff that was delicious. Thank you so much for this once in a lifetime trip for our family. We will cherish the memories from this trip forever. Thank you.

REVIEW.Name: Hui Lin
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Thanks for all helps and assistance given to us. God Bless.

REVIEW.Name: WUHU MILLIONAIRE
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Thank you for all the wonderful helping and serving, we were enjoyed in the clean and beautiful environment. hoping we can come again.

REVIEW.Name: Sense Luxury Sense Luxury
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Its really a wonderful experience living in this beautiful and traditional Balinese Villa. Putu and his group are so nice and helpful. I will definitely recommend this villa to my friends who plan to visit Bali. And hope to have a chance to come again. Thank you.

REVIEW.Name: Carolyn Margaret Swansen
REVIEW.ROverallComments: What a fantastic place to relax, wonderful, friendly staff. The meals were sensational. A great Bali experience and would highly recommend a stay here.

REVIEW.Name: Michael Stuart Gerrard
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Thanks to all the wonderful staff at Villa Kakatua. a beautiful villa for a family to stay in, and the staff are brilliant. Special thanks to Putu, Novi, Yuni, Gede, Dikka, Ngurah and Nengah – you all are wonderful.

REVIEW.Name: Paul Woodfield
REVIEW.ROverallComments: We had a wonderful time for 5 nights; want to stay longer next time. Thank you to Putu and his team. Novi cooked us amazing food. So relaxing and we were all spoilt. It was such a haven walking in through the front gates. Everything at our finger tips. And never long enough but would love to return. I loved the gardens too. Thank you for the birthday celebrations, it was very special and the cake was amazing.

REVIEW.Name: Of Villas Ministry
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Thank you to Putu and all the staff for a wonderful stay at Kakatua Villa. Everything was perfect from the moment we arrived; the food was amazing and not having to cook for our little ones made our stay heaven.

REVIEW.Name: Jason Neville Pearce
REVIEW.ROverallComments: We had a wonderful stay, I would like to compliment all the staff that made us feel welcome. Did not have to do anything, meals were lovely and an abundance of food. All of our needs were met with a smile. I would highly recommend Villa Kakatua to anyone. The perfect getaway to relax and revive. Thank you all.

REVIEW.Name: Ann Serpell
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Thank you for a great time and fantastic foods, breakfast was amazing every day. Thank you for everything, great food, great staff and great family times. Thanks for making my birthday so special.

REVIEW.Name: Tina Brady
REVIEW.ROverallComments: The team is faultless, wonderful, very attentive, fabulous team. I have felt relaxed and thoroughly spoilt; they have all been so kind and attentive without being intrusive. Every single member of the team has been lovely; they obviously take great pride in their work cannot do enough for you. Lovely food, presented beautifully, fantastic unobtrusive service. An amazing holiday, thank you to you all.

REVIEW.Name: Holiday Villa Rental Bali Villa Escapes
REVIEW.ROverallComments: To the beautiful staff at Kakatua villa, thank you for your wonderful hospitality and your joyful spirit. You all made our stay perfect in every way with amazing food and perfect table service. Your smiling faces brightened every moment of our day. A very big thank you and we will all miss you very much.

REVIEW.Name: Rob Paipa
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Best food, good service, staff are always there whenever you need. The gardens and grounds are spectacular and also best location in Canggu. Never to much trouble. In summary 3 families with young kids and we all agree this was a fabulous holiday location, we are sad to have to say goodbye, we are sure we will be back. PS - Novi's cooking was the best.

REVIEW.Name: KILLIAN TRACEY
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Thank you very much for a wonderful stay, the entire villa was immaculate for our entire stay. The food was fantastic, especially the Balinese food. The staff were incredible friendly and helpful and especially good with my 8 years old niece and 6 month old nephew. Thank you once again for a delightful stay.

REVIEW.Name: Asia Good Living
REVIEW.ROverallComments: To all the staff at Kakatua Villa, the food and the staff were 1st class. Thank you for a great holiday and see you next time.

REVIEW.Name: Tanvi Gokhale
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Thank you for everything, you guys were amazing, and made we feel so welcome. We would definitely come back to Kakatua. The services was great, the food very tasty and what a beautiful country. We love Bali and all the people we met. Thank you for your hospitality, love the food and comfort of the villa. We wish you all the best for the New Year and all good things, happiness, health and prosperity.

REVIEW.Name: Jonathan David Chappell
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Beautiful holiday, great position, lovely, lovely, lovely staff and great food. We will be back.

REVIEW.Name: Of Villas Ministry
REVIEW.ROverallComments: To every one of you who made our stay at your beautiful villa so very enjoyable and comfortable. Thank you so much and many blessings. Amazing stay at Villa Kakatua! What a special family holiday. Thank you for your beautiful smiles every morning.

REVIEW.Name: Cornelie Frech
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Thank you for the wonderful time we had with you, foods, juices were so good every morning. Good luck with everything over here, we will be back.

REVIEW.Name: Asia Good Living
REVIEW.ROverallComments: The best thing about Villa Kakatua is the staff – so warm and friendly. We had a fabulous time in the amazing garden, beautiful pool and interesting area. Thanks to Putu and his team.

REVIEW.Name: Sinead Patricia Griffin
REVIEW.ROverallComments: To all the team at Villa Kakatua, thank you for an amazing week. You have helped provide us with memories that will last forever. We will miss you all and see you all again next time.

REVIEW.Name: Sarah Downie
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Villa Kakatua at Canggu has delivered a perfect break for our family. Yudi, Yuni, Dika and Erna were lovely, charming and great with our kids. While Canggu had everything we needed and mostly within walking distance. Cannot wait to come back!

REVIEW.Name: Escape with US Vacations
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Thank you, this was an experience we all will never forget. Everyone was absolutely more than wonderful. I am so happy, good food, very good food, excellent services and loved the pool. Thank you, thank you and thank you.

REVIEW.Name: Heidi Mahon Cook
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Thank you for a wonderful hospitality, we thoroughly enjoyed our stay. The meal on the first night prepared by the staff with chicken tarragon was gourmet quality. Your team met our every need from food preparation and room cleaning, we will definitely consider a return visit. Terima kasih banyak.

REVIEW.Name: Rebeca Garcia-Miguel
REVIEW.ROverallComments: We have had such a wonderful holiday. The villa is beautiful and the staff is amazing. We have been in many nice places around the world but feeling like home is not easy. We will be back for sure so don't say good bye, only see you soon.

REVIEW.Name: Bali Family Villas
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Fantastic stay and the location right next to the beach, the lawn and etc were perfect. Canggu is where we will be staying from now on and the staffs were very hospitable, especially Novi’s food is was delicious.

REVIEW.Name: total bali Total Bali agent
REVIEW.ROverallComments: We have the most fantastic time here. We love all the staff. Please come and see us in Perth.

REVIEW.Name: Getaways Villa
REVIEW.ROverallComments: We have been so spoiled by the villa staff and the food is simply divine. The environment is serene and the perfect place for a quiet hide out yet close to the beach. We could stay in the villa all day, either swimming in the pool, or enjoying massage or just watching TV or going online. There is just something relaxing to be done for the whole family. We look forward to be back again. Thank you.

REVIEW.Name: Vitaliy Ezopov
REVIEW.ROverallComments: It was pleasure to stay with you. Thank you.

REVIEW.Name: Mustafa Khasraw
REVIEW.ROverallComments: The best holiday location, great for kids and the service and pool was amazing. We enjoyed it immensely. The staffs were very helpful always there when you needed them. We felt very safe and comfortable in the villa, we will definitely come to stay next time, and we come to Bali. Thank you to everyone who here made this holiday such a great one.

REVIEW.Name: Lee Davies
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Villa Kakatua is a sweet Haven and the staff are awesome. Really relaxing holiday, great staff - Novi is a fantastic chef. Wonderful team at Villa Kakatua, amazing and restful stays.

REVIEW.Name: Brian Jacob Barrow
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Right from the beginning of our stay, we were met with kindness, graciousness and steadfast care to the end with which was a two hour drive with a staff member to Ubud. The beauty of this villa will take a permanent place in our hearts and minds. We felt safe for 5 days in this tranquil and rejuvenating spot. There was detail to our needs from umbrella when it rained to rides in their car to visit the gym. Thank you very much

REVIEW.Name: Anna Elizabeth Kelly
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Thank you for a wonderful holiday - amazing service, friendly staff and great food and you couldn’t ask for a better location.

REVIEW.Name: Gemma Bronwyn Meddings
REVIEW.ROverallComments: What a wonderful oasis, we have had a beautiful week in this serenity. The staffs are just so fabulous, nothing is too much trouble and everything is always done with a smile. We would love to take them all home with us. Especially Novi the fabulous Cook. Thank you so much for our time here and we feel very lucky.

REVIEW.Name: Villa Queen Villa Queen
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Lovely villa and lovely staff and perfect location. We had a small group (only 3 guests) and the staff was super attentive and accommodating, the few meals we had in villa were amazing. The pool and grounds are a nice little getaway from busy Batu Bolong. Overall it was a nice and relaxing stay.

REVIEW.Name: Fam Yesi
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Sangat memuaskan dan recommends banget ke keluarga dan teman teman. Next time pasti kesini lagi. Thank you and see you again soon.

REVIEW.Name: Samantha Rodriguez
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Thanks for making our first trip to Bali amazing. Service was excellent and the villa is a tropical paradise. We would love to come back soon and tell our friends and loved ones about it. We will forever remember all the nice details of the villa, our day at the pool and all the other nice memories we made here.

REVIEW.Name: Helloworld Drummoyne
REVIEW.ROverallComments: On behalf of both families, thanks for a wonderful stay. The villa gardens and pool are amazing and made our stay here in Canggu for the first time travel memorable. A big thank you to all staff for their great service and attention to details. Nothing was too much hard and they are always happy o help in any way. A special mention to Novi for her wonderful cooking “more spring rolls please” and butler/housekeeping Putu’s friendly service.

REVIEW.Name: Shazlan Sufian
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Thank you for making our stay so enjoyable, we were very well taken care of and we will definitely try and come back very soon.

REVIEW.Name: Bali Family Villas
REVIEW.ROverallComments: We have had the privilege of booking both Villa Kakatua and Villa Kedidi for 21 nights. We had an awesome family reunion. The transfers from the airport were seamless. The staff are all exceptional and made our stay amazing, always willing to do that little bit extra. The meals were outstanding and we chose to have breakfasts and dinners at the villa as we had 13 in our group, from 3 years to 60 years old. The presentation and service was 5 star standards. The chef’s made 3 beautiful birthday cakes for various members of our family. The rooms are serviced daily, spacious and comfortable with adjoining en suites, large beds with air-conditioning and fans. The WiFi is strong and can be used throughout the properties. In house massages can be arranged. The gardens and pool are beautifully maintained and they provided the children with pool toys and countless hours of fun for all. The location is 100 meters from Canggu beach, surf and nightlife. A van and driver are also available and free.

REVIEW.Name: Natasha Su Mei Furneaux
REVIEW.ROverallComments: We spent a wonderful 6 nights here at Villa Kakatua, a few point to note: great services with smiles, the staff preempted what we need during our stay, the staffs were always accommodating and kind to us and our children; flexible with any changes that we may have requested last minute and we appreciated it with suggestions were made from food to great places to eat; villa cleanliness and surroundings. The villa was kept extremely neat and tidy at all times. We loved the gardens and surrounding and we weren’t disrupted by the hotel nearby. Loved the close proximity of shops and beach;iIt was such a wonderful stay here at Villa Kakatua, we all wouldn’t think twice about coming back here again. Special shout out to Putu, Yuni and Yudi for their excellent service, honestly, they are shining stars and a fantastic team.

REVIEW.Name: Taksu Bali Travel & Weddings Taksu Bali Travel & Weddings
REVIEW.ROverallComments: To all the team at Villa Kakatua, thank you for making our stay in Bali such a memorable one. The villa is just gorgeous and kept so beautiful and clean. Service was always with smile and the staff were willing to go above and beyond. They looked after us so well - especially the children. Restaurants recommended were also great but the food in the villa excellent. Thank you to all for all the hard work and for creating a home away from home.

REVIEW.Name: Anne Strickland
REVIEW.ROverallComments: This villa exceeded our expectations. Fantastic location, huge and spacious areas to chill in, massive pool and lovely rooms. The best part about the villa is the staff. Chef Novi is fantastic - the feasts she can whip up in that small kitchen is incredible. Erna and Yudi looked after us perfectly - 5 star service all the time. We were totally impressed with every aspect of our stay and we will be back and will stay longer. Thank you Putu for looking after us and your service attitude is spot on.

REVIEW.Name: Agoda - ID
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Thank you for the lovely stay, well looked after and beautiful villa. We had a lovely relaxing time.

REVIEW.Name: Kendra Mulatz
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Thank you for a lovely stay, this villa is a true oasis and so well located. The gardens are beautiful, and everything is very clean and well maintained. The food was delicious, and the staff were excellent. We had such a great time and we will recommend the villa. Thank you.

REVIEW.Name: Brooke Warren
REVIEW.ROverallComments: What a wonderful place to stay, the food was to die for and the staff so friendly. It is not a matter of if we will come back, rather when we will come back. Thank you to all the staff for making our stay so enjoyable.

REVIEW.Name: Christian Bartley
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Wow, what a great holiday in Canggu and all thanks to our stay at Villa Kakatua. There is only positive attached to this villa, the prime location the perfect villa set up for a family of five and wonderful and friendly staff. They made our staff very special and comfortable. Novi and her amazing cooking will be sadly missed. Thank you to all for making our holiday amazing.

REVIEW.Name: Emily Mary Harbottle
REVIEW.ROverallComments: We came to Bali to celebrate a 40th birthday. Villa Kakatua exceeded our expectation, location was amazing and staff so attentive. On the first day we enjoyed breakfast at the villa - I especially enjoyed the banana pancakes then a walk down to the beach to surf. The Lawn provided a tasty local lunch, JI is a great for sundown cocktails and dessert. We would also recommend Ulekan and Barbacoa. On the last day we chilled at Samadi for yoga and the Sunday market for a great brunch. We also had fantastic Balinese dinners by the staff. Couldn't fault our wonderful stay. We really don't want to leave.

REVIEW.Name: Chee Seng Lai
REVIEW.ROverallComments: This is the second time we stayed at Villa Kakatua, we loved the attentive service by the villa team and the cosy environment. We will definitely return in the very near future.

REVIEW.Name: Catherine Anne Shugg
REVIEW.ROverallComments: We loved our holiday and the comfortable garden is a delightful. Novi has been an excellent chef and all the staff warm, friendly and helpful. Agus was a big help with the kids, we hope we can visit again soon. We wish Putu and all the staff a happy and successful future.

REVIEW.Name: Balissimo.Co / iLuxury Villas Bali
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Thank you Villa Kakatua for a wonderful stay in Bali. It was so nice being greeted everyday with your smile, the grounds and rooms and location could not be better and we hope to be back sooner than later. Thank you.

REVIEW.Name: Tracey Elizabeth Purdy
REVIEW.ROverallComments: What can I say, it was a wonderful villa with the most attentive staff we have ever experienced. Location is amazing, nothing was ever an issue and we will most definitely stay again. Thanks to Putu and his amazing staff. Can’t wait until next time.

REVIEW.Name: Kim Young Hoal
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Everything was great, villa staff and the villa ambiences. Thank you.

REVIEW.Name: Bali Villas Cantik
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Thank you, we all had an incredible week and the villa and location is perfect. The food was amazing and the staff were all wonderful and friendly. We will definitely recommend to others.

REVIEW.Name: Holiday Villa Rental Bali Villa Escapes
REVIEW.ROverallComments: A wonderful stay and looked after by caring a wonderful staff. A real treat and as a single traveler felt like a home. Thank you all.

REVIEW.Name: Kim Margaret Burns
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Thank you to the team of Villa Kakatua. We came here from Singapore, Darwin, Dubai and Sydney to celebrate a very special 50th Birthday and 10th birthday. Putu and his team have taken care all of us, helped us as a family come together and celebrate. We cannot thank you all enough, you have contributed to our life long memories.

REVIEW.Name: Bali Family Villas
REVIEW.ROverallComments: The whole experience has been amazing, the staff area the best - very friendly and always happy to help. We will definitely be coming back and recommend to our friends.

REVIEW.Name: Andianstyle
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Thanks to Putu, Yuni, Pande, Wayan and Erna and the amazing staff, what an amazing villa, what an amazing holiday. We loved every minute of it and we can’t wait to come back. Look out July 2019.

REVIEW.Name: Hyslop ands James Travel Associates - Malcolm Hyslop
REVIEW.ROverallComments: A warm thank you to all the staff at Villa Kakatua, getting our 2 week holiday in Bali and Lombok to the most relaxing start. Service was outstanding as we have the meals suggestion, not to mention the taste and quality of the food. Location of the villa could not be better and this villa was perfect for the needs of our 2 families. We wish you all well and many guests to come.

REVIEW.Name: Erika Danyel Jack
REVIEW.ROverallComments: We have had the most amazing holiday. Family get together celebrating our wedding anniversary. Novi and all the staff have gone over and above to look after us. We will treasure these memories forever. Thank you and love from all of us.

REVIEW.Name: Jacqueline Margaret Chapple
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Everything has been perfect and we could not have asked for a better stay. Location is excellent - you couldn’t get a better positioned villa. A huge thank you to all the wonderful and friendly staff who have accommodated our every need. Food has been better then restaurant quality even with our entire special dietary needs. The villa accommodation is very comfortable and kept in very clean, pool and gorgeous Bali gardens. We don’t want to leave this Bali paradise and have had the best time. We can’t wait to come back again.

REVIEW.Name: Holiday Villa Rental Bali Villa Escapes
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Thank you to all the staff here, we have had such an easy and relaxing holiday. Nothing was a problem for the staff, they did everything they could to make our time here easy. Delicious food, welcoming smiles and anticipating our needs. Just a few of great things about spending time here. Thank you once again for everything and we can come back again soon.

REVIEW.Name: Maria Theresa Que
REVIEW.ROverallComments: We had such a lovely time in Villa Kakatua and I hope we can come back someday. The service and the staff was the best and we will miss them when we leave.

REVIEW.Name: Jessica Bradshaw
REVIEW.ROverallComments: What an amazing villa to spend my 40th birthday celebrations with my family. From the start the staff were amazing, extremely helpful and always there to help with a big smile. Yuni made us fantastic food and all of the other staff were attentive and nothing was a problem. They also went out of their way to decorate the villa on my birthday and Yuni made an amazing cake. Altogether a fantastic trip in a lovely, relaxing villa. We will definitely recommend to friends. Thank you Yuni and the team of Villa Kakatua.

REVIEW.Name: Robert Kooyman
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Thank you dear Villa Kakatua team, you have been absolutely fantastic. Amazing villa and amazing service, the best we have ever stayed in. This is how it must feel to be famous. Thank you all for your amazing service and your warm way of making us feel at home. We loved it.

REVIEW.Name: Agoda - ID
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Amazing, thank you so much for the wonderful service and food. We will definitely be back soon and recommend the place to everyone. Thank you.

REVIEW.Name: Mayank Sharma
REVIEW.ROverallComments: We loved our stay in Villa Kakatua. The property is so gorgeous and relaxing, the perfect vacation villa. The staff truly made our stay more enjoyable with their smiling faces and warm hospitality. Novi’s food was amazing. We will be coming back to stay at Villa Kakatua for sure.

REVIEW.Name: Bel Koopman
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Thank you for the beautiful stay at Villa Kakatua, our stay has been a memorable one with wonderful food and such thoughtful and fantastic service from all the staff. We have enjoyed being able to truly relax but also but also super fun time bike riding and white water rafting organized by the villa. Many thanks from all of us.

REVIEW.Name: Nomad The Luxe agent
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Thank you for the fantastic stay in Bali. The service was impeccable with care takers being attentive through the entire stay. This place gave us the authentic Balinese experience and we couldn’t ask for anything more. We appreciated everything and everyone.

REVIEW.Name: Holiday Villa Rental Bali Villa Escapes
REVIEW.ROverallComments: We would like to thank all the wonderful team at Villa Kakatua. We all had a brilliant time and cannot wait to return to Canggu. Villa Kakatua will always hold a special place in our heart. A special thank you the Chef Novi who is the best Chef we have came across during our travel in Bali. We thank you for your hospitality and all the amazing meals you loved prepared for us. Thanks to all who helped create this wonderful holiday for all of us.

REVIEW.Name: Sharon Louise Watterson
REVIEW.ROverallComments: A big thank you to everyone for making our holiday so enjoyable. It has been amazing, a wonderful week filled with delicious foods, lovely staff and always smiles. Such a lovely relaxing environment, nothing was ever too much for the staff. Thank you for the big effort to make the birthday celebration so special. We are leaving with fond memories and hope to see you all again one day.

REVIEW.Name: Sammy Ahmed Elazab
REVIEW.ROverallComments: We have had a great holiday at Villa Kakatua. The accommodation and the setting were amazing and we have all enjoyed spending our days chilling by the pool or enjoying dinner around the dining table. The staff have been absolutely amazing and they really made our stay so special. They are all so friendly, warm and accommodating. We will be back and would recommend Villa Kakatua to anyone coming to Canggu. Thank you Villa Kakatua and team.
